articles.description: The FDA has granted Emergency Use Authorization for the InspectIR COVID-19 breathalyzer, the first of its kind for COVID-19.  | The FDA granted an emergency use authorization for the first COVID-19 diagnostic test that can detect the virus through breath samp…
